short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance YouTube with Wordbook: definitions, personal dictionary, and translation, for a streamlined learning experience!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your YouTube Experience: This extension lets you effortlessly access word definitions, build a personal dictionary, and translate video captions as you watch YouTube.
